alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Howell; Ozark; Texas; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 7:47AM CDT until April 05 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Ozark County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Wright County in southwestern Missouri... Douglas County in southwestern Missouri... Northwestern Howell County in south central Missouri... Southwestern Texas County in south central Missouri... * Until 830 AM CDT. * At 746 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles south of Ava, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bryant Creek State Park, Mountain Grove, Willow Springs, Cabool, Houston, Norwood, Wasola, Brixey, Noble, Willhoit, Brushyknob, Bucyrus, Elk Creek, Gentryville, Thornfield, Siloam Springs, Rome, Vanzant, Squires and Dora. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for south central and southwestern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for south central and southwestern Missouri.
